channel.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
channel.description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Oct 06 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 29 September 2025 through Monday, 6 October 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +35, -0

Support increases (35)

API

  1. api ➞ SVGAElement ➞ download
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ SVGScriptElement ➞ async
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ CSSStyleRule ➞ style ➞ returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ Document ➞ activeViewTransition
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ HTMLElement ➞ style ➞ returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ MathMLElement ➞ style ➞ returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ SVGElement ➞ style ➞ returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ Window ➞ getComputedStyle ➞ returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ at-rules ➞ position-try
    Added to Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ interest-delay
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ interest-delay ➞ normal
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ properties ➞ interest-delay-end
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ properties ➞ interest-delay-end ➞ normal
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  6. css ➞ properties ➞ interest-delay-start
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  7. css ➞ properties ➞ interest-delay-start ➞ normal
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  8. css ➞ selectors ➞ interest-source
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  9. css ➞ selectors ➞ interest-target
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  10. css ➞ selectors ➞ target-after
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  11. css ➞ selectors ➞ target-before
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ iframe ➞ cross-origin-top-navigation-by-user-activation
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event ➞ context_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event ➞ filepath_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event ➞ navigation_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  5. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event ➞ status_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event ➞ timestamp_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browsingContext ➞ downloadEnd_event ➞ url_parameter
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  8. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browser ➞ setDownloadBehavior
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  9. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browser ➞ setDownloadBehavior ➞ downloadBehavior_parameter
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  10. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ browser ➞ setDownloadBehavior ➞ userContexts_parameter
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  11. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setLocaleOverride ➞ locale_parameter ➞ sets_navigator_language
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  12. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setUserAgentOverride
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  13. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setUserAgentOverride ➞ contexts_parameter
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  14. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setUserAgentOverride ➞ userAgent_parameter
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  15. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setUserAgentOverride ➞ userContexts_parameter
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 118

Show all 118 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (48)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 26 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-contentful-paint
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-paint
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ Element ➞ scrollIntoView ➞ options_parameter ➞ block_option
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ Element ➞ scrollIntoView ➞ options_parameter ➞ container_option
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ Element ➞ scrollIntoView ➞ options_parameter ➞ inline_option
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ HTMLCanvasElement ➞ getContext ➞ 2d_context ➞ options_colorType_parameter
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ NavigationPrecommitController
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ NavigationPrecommitController ➞ redirect
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  9. api ➞ NavigationTransition ➞ committed
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ background-repeat-x
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ background-repeat-y
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. css ➞ properties ➞ container-type ➞ weak_containment
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. css ➞ types ➞ mod ➞ mixed_type_parameters
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. css ➞ types ➞ rem ➞ mixed_type_parameters
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  6. css ➞ types ➞ round ➞ mixed_type_parameters
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

WEBASSEMBLY

  1. webassembly ➞ api ➞ JSTag_static
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ disableSimulation
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ handleRequestDevicePrompt
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateAdapter
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateAdvertisement
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  6. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateCharacteristic
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  7. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateCharacteristicResponse
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  8. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateDescriptor
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  9. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateDescriptorResponse
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  10. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateGattConnectionResponse
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  11. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateGattDisconnection
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  12. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulatePreconnectedPeripheral
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  13. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth ➞ simulateService
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ sidePanel ➞ GetPanelOptions
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ sidePanel ➞ OpenOptions
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. webextensions ➞ api ➞ sidePanel ➞ PanelBehavior
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. webextensions ➞ api ➞ sidePanel ➞ PanelLayout
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  5. webextensions ➞ api ➞ sidePanel ➞ PanelOpenedInfo
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

  19. webextensions ➞ manifest ➞ side_panel ➞ default_path
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

New entries (69)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 26 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

  1. api ➞ CSSStyleRule ➞ style ➞ returns_CSSStyleProperties
  2. api ➞ Document ➞ activeViewTransition

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ iframe ➞ cross-origin-top-navigation-by-user-activation

WEBASSEMBLY

  1. webassembly ➞ api ➞ JSTag_static

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ bluetooth

API

  • Previous report: Monday, 29 September 2025

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 29 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 22 September 2025 through Monday, 29 September 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +1, -0

Support increases (1)

CSS

  1. css ➞ selectors ➞ active-view-transition
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 8

Show all 8 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (4)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 19 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ position-area ➞ span-left
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ position-area ➞ span-right
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ cookies ➞ Cookie ➞ expirationDate
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ cookies ➞ set ➞ expirationDate
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

New entries (4)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 19 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (“Removed BCD entries”) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ position-area ➞ span-left
  2. css ➞ properties ➞ position-area ➞ span-right

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ cookies ➞ Cookie ➞ expirationDate
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ cookies ➞ set ➞ expirationDate

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period
  • Previous report: Monday, 22 September 2025

BCD Watch: A service of

Subscribe: RSS • Atom • JSON

This report was generated by diffing v7.1.7 (Friday, 19 September 2025) and v7.1.8 (Friday, 26 September 2025)

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 22 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 15 September 2025 through Monday, 22 September 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +30, -0

Support increases (30)

API

  1. api ➞ CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ CSSStyleProperties ➞ cssFloat
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. api ➞ Document ➞ moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  4. api ➞ Document ➞ startViewTransition
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. api ➞ DocumentFragment ➞ moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  6. api ➞ Element ➞ moveBefore
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  7. api ➞ GPUAdapterInfo ➞ isFallbackAdapter
    Added to Safari  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  8. api ➞ GPUDevice ➞ importExternalTexture ➞ videoframe_source
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  9. api ➞ RTCDataChannel ➞ closing_event
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  10. api ➞ RTCDataChannel ➞ transferable
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  17. api ➞ SpeechRecognition ➞ phrases
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  18. api ➞ SpeechRecognitionPhrase ➞ SpeechRecognitionPhrase
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  19. api ➞ SpeechRecognitionPhrase
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  20. api ➞ SpeechRecognitionPhrase ➞ boost
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  21. api ➞ SpeechRecognitionPhrase ➞ phrase
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css ➞ properties ➞ view-transition-name ➞ match-element
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

HTTP

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Permissions-Policy ➞ aria-notify
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

JAVASCRIPT

  1. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ Map ➞ getOrInsert
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  3. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ WeakMap ➞ getOrInsert
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  4. javascript ➞ builtins ➞ WeakMap ➞ getOrInsertComputed
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setScreenOrientationOverride
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver ➞ bidi ➞ emulation ➞ setLocaleOverride ➞ updates_existing_sandboxes
    Added to Firefox  ➞  1 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 106

Show all 106 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (58)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 12 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ GPUQueue ➞ onSubmittedWorkDone
    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ Permissions ➞ permission_screen-wake-lock
    Backfilled for Safari  ➞  2 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 15 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 8 September 2025 through Monday, 15 September 2025🔗

Browser Support Changes: +3, -0

Support increases (3)

API

  1. api ➞ Document ➞ ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines
  2. api ➞ Element ➞ ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html ➞ elements ➞ input ➞ type_color ➞ accepts_css_colors
    Added to Firefox  ➞  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 19

Show all 19 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (10)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 5 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ toJSON
    Backfilled for Chrome  ➞  3 of 3 engines
